desc: JerkyGent makes it easy to discover and try great tasting craft jerky brands every month. Our expert jerky curators scout the country to find the best beef jerky and ship it to your door monthly. Sign up to receive delicious, top quality, artisan jerky personalized to you. Awesome gift for men and beef jerky lovers!

layout.text: Discover America's Best Beef Jerky Brands
Join the #1 jerky of the month club to enjoy premium jerky from jerky makers across the country.
